title: Dar stresses UK parliamentarians’ role to promote people-to-people ties for bilateral relations
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 18 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister, (DPM/FM) Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Friday underscored the vital role of UK parliamentarians to promote people-to-people ties in deepening Pak-UK bilateral relations.
He made these remarks while interacting with a delegation led by Lord Sarfraz of Kensington, a DPM’s Office news release said.
The delegation featured Lord and Lady Lancaster, Dr. Ibrahim Almojel and other business leaders. They lauded Pakistan’s rich tourism landscape and growing business potential.
